rComments: She is not very clear on her instructions. She makes you guess things and if you get them wrong she laughs. I'm sure she doesn't mean it in a bad way, but it does lower one's confidence. I was so excited to continue French but this made me feel like I was being forced to take the class.

As all language classes go, participation is always your friend. But, she has GOT to be the easiest French teacher I've had, easy grader and lenient. I love her, because I don't study or practice my crappy French enough but still got an A- in the class which is a miracle.
She is enthusiastic, but her quality of teaching is lacking. She often confused more people than helped them when trying to explain a complicated concept in class.

you will need iLrn and your book. The course is fun and she is there to help you whenever you need her. one of the kindest professors i've had by far in my life. she knows the language very well. The course is easy, but expect to put in a lot of work. it is a language you must learn within ten weeks, you have to put effort.
